The City of Murfreesboro, TN (110,000) has used an overlay district that requires design review.  After 10 years experience with it, the Planning Commission is considering amendments to the ordiance.  Below is a link to the ordinance as recommended.

author: Ben Boike
text:
I am looking for a good model ordinance for commercial overlay districts specifically outlining design standards.  We are a first ring suburb with a tansitioning regional commercial corridor.  The corridor has three distinct areas north to south - from denser smaller lots with more of a neighborhood feel, to a more traditional commerical area, to a suburban big box area.  Does anyone have something similar or know of communities with something similar.
Thanks!!
title: Commercial Design Standard Overlay Districts
